oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Remedy for constipation and nervousness
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed one page remedy for constipation and nervousness which gives instructions on taking Park-Davis castor oil capsules. They are priced $1.00 per hundred at Standard Drug Stores.

Parke-Davis and Company was founded in 1866 in Detroit, Michigan by Dr. Samuel P. Duffield. It became one of America's oldest and largest drug makers and played an important role in medical history. Parke-Davis was bought by Warner-Lambert in 1970 and then acquired by Pfizer in 2000.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Duffield, Samuel P.; Parke, Davis & Company; Capsules (Pharmacy)
Pills; Medicines
